text: aye Nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) ki duno biwiyo!) agar tum duno Allah ke saamne tauba karlo (to bahuth behtar hai) yaqinan tumhaare dil jhuk pade hai aur agar tum nabi ke qilaaf ek dosre ki madad karogi, pas yaqinan us ka kaar-saaz Allah hai aur Jibraeel hai aur nek ahle imaan aur in ke alaawa farishte bhi madad karne waale hai
